name: Peter Blue and the carnival of death
name_original: Peter Blue and the carnival of death
description:
A new carnival arrived to the city.

All people were having fun with the music and candy.

When suddently an emergency call arrived at the police station.

The "blues" rushed immediatelly to the carnival.

Peter a.k.a "Pete" Blue was closest to it, so he arrived first . . . 

#Beansjam

Developed by:

Mike Dahm (Gameplay, Design), Roland Fahlbusch (Gameplay, Programming), Andreas Dahm (Gameplay, Programming)
